alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 29 at 12:23PM ChST until July 29 at 3:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: Corrected TYPO ...HIGH LIGHTNING RISK UNTIL 3 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High risk of lightning. * WHERE...West coast of Guam, including all beaches near Tumon Bay. * WHEN...Until 3 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...A lightning strike can cause serious injuries with life- long health issues, and even death. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Thunderstorms are producing occasional lightning near and just offshore along the west coast, near Tumon Bay.
info.instruction: If thunder is heard or lightning is seen, go indoors and stay there until thunderstorms have dissipated. When access to a building is not available, get inside a vehicle and avoid touching any metal parts.
